snippet.title: LEGO® Harry Potter™ Collection - Official “Relive the Magic” Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Wands at the ready! It’s time to return to Hogwarts in relive the magic in the remastered LEGO® Harry PotterTM Collection!

The LEGO® Harry PotterTM: Collection brings LEGO® Harry PotterTM: Years 1-4 and LEGO® Harry PotterTM: Years 5-7 together in one game, now remastered with enhanced graphics for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

This compilation unites the creative prowess of LEGO and the expansive world of Harry Potter, with an exciting journey full of spell-casting, potion-making, puzzle-solving, lessons, dueling and much more for players of all ages to enjoy.

Follow LEGO Harry Potter Collection:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LEGOHarryPotterGame

Follow WB Games:
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/wbgames
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@warnerbrosgames Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/wbgames Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wbgames
      
Follow TT Games:
Twitter: https://x.com/TTGames

#LEGO #HarryPotter #TTGames #Collection
